dct_description_sm: North oriented towards upper left corner. Reprinted 1943 by A.M.S. 2-43. 113610. For use by War and Navy Department Agencies only. Military grid (blue). "Grid provisional." Important buildings are named. Southern Italy Grid - Convergence - Grid North is 02°39ʹE. of True North on this sheet. AMS 1. Reprinted 1943 by A.M.S. United States. Army Map Service In upper left margin: "Italy." Great Britain. War Office. General Staff. Geographical Section. G.S.G.S. no. 4380
dct_creator_sm: Great Britain. War Office. General Staff. Geographical Section
dct_publisher_sm: [London] : War Office. General Staff. Geographical Section, 1943.
Washington, D.C. : Army Map Service, U.S. Army, 1942.
